title: To Paulina Porizkova, Betrayal Is More Than Skin Deep
description: In her memoir, “No Filter,” the supermodel opens up about her marriage — and the unwelcome surprise that surfaced after her husband’s death.
dc:creator: Michelle Ruiz
category: No Filter: The Good, the Bad and the Beautiful (Book)
